General.Name: MINK Ventures Corporation
General.Description: Mink Ventures Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for battery metals comprising nickel, copper, and cobalt deposits. It entered into an option agreement to acquire an 80% interest in the Montcalm project, which consists of a contiguous block comprising 196 claim units covering approximately 3,964 hectares located in Montcalm township, Ontario, Canada. Mink Ventures Corporation was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
